name: LUBRANIL® DF 45
description: LUBRANIL® DF 45 is a VOC-free dispersion for paints.Improves open time, improves re-workability, VOC-free and therefore replacement of VOC containing open time additives possible without loosing of performance and therefore recommended for kitchens and bathrooms. Improves slip, good wet-abrasion resistance and with no odor. Our high quality wax emulsions and dispersions are a necessity for all customers who prefer working with ready-made emulsions or dispersions in contrast to a dry wax. The ease of incorporation is the key benefit of liquid products.
